item.title: Reroofing a concrete shed
item.author: 2e0byo@gmail.com (John Morris)
item.description: We have a brick built shed with a concrete roof, which serves me as workshop. Unfortunately when we moved in the torched on felt (the proper three-layer system) had died in a large part, and water could make its way inside. Thus it needed re-roofing. Now, whilst I have no experience roofing beyond tacking down felt on wooden roofs (which is infinitely simpler than what ended up happening), I immediately decided to volunteer to re-roof it if the landlord would pay.
